dc:title: On Pilgrimage - October 1958
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Expresses dismay at their difficulty in finding a new house of hospitality and is upset at the process of urban destruction instead of restoration. But says their uncertainty is that of all poor people. Mentions visitors and books to read.
